channel.title: Items when u first login+fighting exp
channel.description:
where can i change the items ppl get when they first log in??
and how can i change the fighting exp, to train faster??
please help

item.title: Items when u first login+fighting exp
item.dc:creator: @Meric Meric
item.description:
@Meric wrote:

I find the Item starter:

if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(1291, 1);
addItem(1171, 1);
addItem(841, 1);
addItem(882, 100);
addItem(380, 100);
addItem(995, 10000);
}

I edited it but it doesnt work:O

Also the combat exp:

public int CombatExpRate = 1000;

I made it 1000, but still if i Hit 1 i get 120exp

Please help…

Read full topic

item.title: Items when u first login+fighting exp
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

Or you can search in client.java for “starter” and you can add items to show up in the inventory of your player when they log in and add combat xp.

Read full topic
